attributes.action: I would like information on gambling given to children at school
attributes.additional_details: Betting companies are finding ways to avoid taxes and are generating ridiculous amounts of money off the back of vulnerable people. There needs to be some level of education to prevent this happening. There is not enough. This Government has a duty of care and people are suffering because of these companies. I would like parliament to seriously consider taking action and do what is right.
attributes.background: With the extortionate amounts of money these gambling companies earn & more importantly the impact it has on people’s lives I believe there should be practical  education given to young people on the truths of gambling.I would like government & parliament to discuss introducing education & action it

rejection.details:
Gambling is already included in the statutory PHSE curriculum. You can read more here:

https://assets.publishing.service.gov.uk/government/uploads/system/uploads/attachment_data/file/1019542/Relationships_Education__Relationships_and_Sex_Education__RSE__and_Health_Education.pdf
